name: aardvark
description: A nocturnal mammal known for its long tongue and termite diet.

name: albatross
description: A large seabird with an impressive wingspan.

name: alligator
description: A reptile resembling a crocodile, often found in swamps.

name: anteater
description: A mammal specialized in eating ants and termites.

name: antelope
description: A herbivorous mammal known for its agility and speed.

description: A small, armored mammal native to the Americas.

description: A burrowing mammal known for its distinctive black and white stripes.

description: A semi-aquatic rodent known for building dams and lodges.

description: A massive herbivore with a hump on its back, found in North America.

description: A wild pig often found in forests and known for its tusks.

description: A colorful insect with delicate wings, known for its pollination role.

description: A majestic bird of prey known for its keen eyesight and powerful talons.
